json.text: Who is it?
It’s me, Xiao Lu.
Ah, Sister Lu. Come in. Please come in.
Here. Have a seat.
Pastor Chen, two “Eastern Lightning” preachers came to my home.
I drove them away.
They went to your home? (Yeah.)
Hmm.
Hello, Jin Xiangdong?
I want to talk to you. Come over.
Hmm. Okay, okay!
Our loving Lord Jesus! You are our only Savior!
Your precious blood is eternally effective.
Neither is there salvation in any other.
O Lord! We call on You.
Please have mercy on us.
May Your grace and peace be with us.
May You keep us.
In today’s world, the devil, as a roaring lion, walks about,
seeking whom it may devour.
May the Lord strengthen our faith.
May the Lord be our refuge and our reliance. (Amen.)
In the holy name of my Lord Jesus Christ we pray.
Amen.
Okay, have a seat.
I urgently called you here today
mainly to talk about the “Eastern Lightning” deceiving people.
Yesterday, two betrayers in our church went to deceive Lu Xiu’en.
Yeah, I drove them away.
I’m afraid that they’ll come back for me.
If you can’t drive them away, beat them.
Hmm. And these, distribute them to the brothers and sisters in the meeting.
Make the gravity of this matter very clear.
Say it as seriously as possible!
Saying this might be improper!
We always say the “Eastern Lightning” gouges eyes and cuts off ears,
and drugs their books.
Some brothers and sisters are tired of it,
and some simply don’t believe it,
because some of their relatives and friends believe in the “Eastern Lightning,”
but they’re not like what the materials say.
Yeah! Some believers in our church
have contacted with the people of the “Eastern Lightning” and read their books.
They didn’t believe. But they were safe and sound.
So are our materials true?
If they’re not true and we say this, the Lord won’t be pleased with us.
Which side are you on?
If they snatch all the sheep, what account can we give to the Lord?
Besides, how can the ministry be carried out?
How are we going to run the church?
In order to resist the “Eastern Lightning,”
the pastors of other churches have contacted me,
and we all agreed to do so.
There’s nothing improper!
We do it for defending the Lord’s way!
But it’s groundless to say that.
I’m afraid to offend the Lord!
We work for the Lord and protect the flock,
so the Lord will remember!
Hmm. I understand Pastor Chen.
In fact evidence isn’t important,
as long as our sheep won’t be drawn away.
Besides, the government cracks down on the “Eastern Lightning,”
so it’s not a big deal for us to say so.
Now the most crucial thing is to keep our flock from being lost.
Since the government said so,
we just tell the brothers and sisters like that.
Anyway, it won’t bring us harm.
And remember
that the “Eastern Lightning” says God does a new work again to save man.
This is impossible,
because we believe in the Lord Jesus and we got saved.
The Lord Jesus’ precious blood is eternally effective.
Once saved, always saved!
Don’t believe them.
After you go back, pay more attention to the brothers and sisters.
When you find them in an unusual state, report to me immediately.
Goodbye, Pastor.
Pastor, goodbye. (Bye.)
Goodbye. (Hmm, bye.)
Xiaodie. Come, come over here.
I wanna talk with you. Come, sit here.
Have you got used to our church? (Hmm, yes!)
Does anyone treat you unfairly? (No.)
Yesterday Pastor Chen had a meeting with us.
He said we must protect the Lord’s flock
and prevent the “Eastern Lightning” from snatching the believers.
Everyone here is an important co-worker.
We must be cautious!
Pastor Chen specifically emphasized that we should never be soft with them.
Is it right to do so?
Can Pastor Chen be wrong?
He’s believed in the Lord for decades.
We must listen to him!
We’ve printed hundreds of booklets about the “Eastern Lightning.”
Distribute them as soon as possible.
Once we find someone believing in the “Eastern Lightning,”
we should deal with him seriously.
The betrayer will never have a good end.
Yeah. We have to be cautious.
Hmm. Let’s be very careful. (OK.)
Brothers and sisters, peace to you in the Lord.
And to you.
Let’s turn to Matthew 6:20.
Matthew 6:20 says,
We all know that people who love the Lord should offer willingly
and shouldn’t be worried that offering will bring you burden.
On the contrary, the Lord will doubly bless those who make offerings.
Why did the Lord Jesus approve the poor widow who offered up two mites?
Because she offered all she had…
In the name of the Lord Jesus Christ. Amen.
Amen.
That’s all for today’s meeting.
Peace. (May the Lord bless you.)
Xiaodie. Come. Have a rest.
Genesis 2:18 says,
Xiaodie, God created Adam and created for him a helpmate, Eve.
God approves men’s affection.
You see, God created man and woman
for the purpose that they could support each other.
Don’t you think that we should also support each other? …
Is there anybody home?
They’re back!
They’re “Eastern Lightning” deceivers.
Pastor Chen said when they come, beat them.
Drive them away!
Pastor Chen said that?
Hurry up!
Hello, brother. Is Sister Lu at home?
Shameless. Go away!
Brother, we don’t mean any harm—
Go now! Get out of here.
I couldn’t understand you. Are you crazy?
You have nothing better to do but deceive others all day long.
I warn you. If you come again, I’ll call the police.
Sister, you’re back?
You two again?
Sister, if you have time, can we have a talk?
Yeah, sister. Here is a tape. You can listen to it.
I don’t wanna listen.
Sister, sister. The Lord Jesus has really come back.
Blessed are the poor in spirit…
Sister Ruan, you haven’t come to the meeting for a long time.
How are you recently?
Sister, you care about me and visit me often.
I don’t know how to thank you.
This is what I should do! Thank the Lord!
We are a family in spirit.
Recently the “Eastern Lightning” is very rampant.
Pastor Chen shows much care for the brothers and sisters
and he is worried that we would be deceived.
If you have time, come to the meeting! OK?
One thing has been buried in my heart for a long time.
I’ve never told anyone. I feel very miserable.
When I got married, I was a bit over twenty.
At that time,
my husband often worked out of town and seldom came home.
Pastor Chen saw that it was easy to take advantage of me,
so he forcibly had me for a long time.
You should thank the Lord!
Tamar gave birth to Perez and Zerah with her father-in-law.
The prostitute Rahab bore Boaz. Ruth bore Obed.
And Bathsheba gave birth to Solomon with David.
Outwardly, these four women were immoral.
But they made their own contribution to God’s plan of salvation.
You also make a contribution to God’s plan of salvation.
Don’t you think so?
Later, I had his child.
Pastor Chen was a famous person here.
Others thought he expounded the Bible well,
and said he was a holy man.
My husband and I could only swallow the humiliation silently.
But he just couldn’t bear it and died a few years later.
I raised the child myself and did some odd jobs to earn a living.
I want to attend the meeting regularly.
But I … really can’t face Pastor Chen.
I thought of going to another church.
However, others said one should stay where he was baptized,
and that those who ran around, were prostitutes, and adulteresses…
Wait! I think I left my cellphone upstairs.
I forgot it. You go first! (Okay.)
Pastor Chen, I have to say something.
If you don’t settle Xiaodie’s pregnancy,
her parents will make trouble.
Then our church will be affected.
O Lord! I beg You. Please forgive me!
Pastor Chen, I have another matter to discuss with you.
Now you give me less and less money.
It’s not enough for my expenses!
Last month you bought a new car.
How can it not be enough?
You have to save money!
You know that I’ve completely offered myself up to work for the Lord!
I deal with everything in the church.
I do them all for you.
You know that the offerings these few months are less and less!
You think I don’t know?
It doesn’t match the account!
Sister Xu. (Hmm.)
Don’t worry.
You’ve spent so much for the Lord.
I’ll keep your matter in mind. (OK.)
What the hell were you doing out? The house is a mess.
Our business lost more than ten thousand. Don’t you care?
Bitch, why don’t you say anything?
Say what? You only know how to drink all day long.
Have you ever cared about me?
These bills have been here a long time, but you don’t deal with them.
I need to do it every time.
Fine! I’ll spend the day to deal with them…
O Lord! Dear Lord Jesus.
You’re my refuge. You’re my Savior.
O Lord! I’m very weak and confused now.
Please save me.
O Lord! Pastor Chen took advantage of Sister Ruan
and embezzled Your offerings with Sister Xu.
O Lord! So many unrighteous things happened in the church.
What should I do?
O Lord! Your word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path!
Please guide me to walk the way ahead.
O Lord! You’re my Rock.
May You strengthen my faith!
Hello. Cousin, it’s me, Xiu’en.
I want to stay at your home for a few days.
Okay, I’ll go tomorrow.
Cousin.
Yeah! Coming! Xiu’en.
Come in and have a seat.
Did you fight with him again?
Well, stay here a few days. Calm down first.
You can’t always quarrel like this! OK?
Is Sister Lin at home? (Yes.)
Xiaoying is here. We often have meetings together.
I’ll open the door.
Coming.
Xiaoying. Come in, please! (Sister Lin.)
Xiu’en! When did you get here?
I just arrived. Come in and have a seat.
Xiaoying, please introduce us.
This is my high school classmate, Xiu’en. (Hello!)
This is Sister Gao and Sister Zhao.
Hello! (Hello!)
Today it’s really God’s arrangement that we can get together.
Sister Gao and Sister Zhao are also preachers,
so we can have a good fellowship. (Okay!)
Sister, when did you believe in the Lord?
1995. And you?
From childhood.
You must be well versed in the Bible.
I have some questions puzzling me greatly.
Let’s discuss about…
I just can’t figure out why.
Now the church condition becomes worse and worse,
the brothers and sisters lose faith and love,
and the sick people have no peace.
The previously prosperous church is in a state of disunity.
What can we do to revive the church?
Now the churches are generally in such a state.
Since the churches became desolate, we should find out the reason.
Then … what’s the reason?
Sisters, what do you think of it?
Speaking of this topic,
if we know the reason why the temple became desolate
at the end of the Age of the Law,
we’ll know why the churches are desolate today.
At that time, the temple was full of Jehovah’s glory.
No one dared commit evil deeds in it, even the “king” of the people.
But later, the temple became a “den of robbers.”
Why didn’t Jehovah God do something about it?
That was because Jehovah God had left the temple and begun a new work.
That is, God had been incarnated
and begun the work of crucifixion to redeem mankind.
When the Lord Jesus came to do the new work,
the Holy Spirit didn’t uphold the work of the law anymore
but upheld Jesus’ work.
All those who followed the Lord Jesus Christ to enter the new age
had ways to go on and life supply.
Those who failed to follow
were trapped in the sins and became more and more fallen.
Even if they committed sins, they received no discipline.
So the temple became a “den of robbers.”
This fulfilled the prophecy in the Bible.
Right!
If one can’t keep up with the Holy Spirit’s work,
he can’t receive God’s supply.
Those who stubbornly kept the law and refused to come out of the temple
would rather lose the Holy Spirit’s working than follow the Lord Jesus.
This is because they didn’t know Jehovah and Jesus are in fact one God.
So, every time God does a new work,
He’ll eliminate many people who can’t keep up with the Holy Spirit’s work.
Excuse me, I have to answer a call. (Okay.)
Hello? Sister Zhang.
Yes, I’m at my cousin’s.
How about coming over?
Yeah, I’ll be waiting for you.
Hmm. Bye.
Let’s continue! (Okay.)
As I was saying…
Just now we fellowshipped about the churches’ being desolate.
We’re also puzzled about that. Let’s listen.
That’s great!
We’re all trying to revive the church, but it’s useless.
Since you’re here today, please tell us more about it!
OK, let’s seek and fellowship today.
May God lead us. Thank God! (Thank the Lord!)
Now the churches are desolate,
just as the temple at the end of the Age of the Law.
The reason is that the Lord Jesus has returned in the flesh and come to China,
and He has started a stage of new work of thoroughly saving mankind—
So you’re preachers from the “Eastern Lightning”?
You’re the ones who deceive the brothers and sisters everywhere!
Sisters, please don’t get irritated.
Let’s quiet our heart to seek and fellowship patiently.
We don’t wanna listen anymore!
I advise you to repent to the Lord immediately!
We believe in Jesus, so we got saved.
There’s no need to receive any other salvation.
We have nothing else to fellowship.
The “Eastern Lightning” is a heresy!
It specially deceives brothers and sisters in the Lord.
Never expect to deceive us!
I advise you to repent to the Lord immediately!
Xiu’en, don’t get agitated! Let’s fellowship first.
Fellowship what?
Xiaoying,
I never expected that you would be deceived by the “Eastern Lightning”!
Don’t you know? The “Eastern Lightning” is a heresy!
They specially come to deceive us.
The pastor has told us so many times that we should never contact with them.
Once we do, we’ll be deceived!
Why are you so foolish?
Xiu’en…
Cousin! Why are you so muddled?
Have you believed in God for so many years in vain?
Why do you receive heresy? You mustn’t believe in it!
Otherwise, you can’t get saved!
Cousin, we mustn’t betray the Lord.
Ask them to leave now. They can’t stay in our home!
Xiu’en, we often called on the Lord for guidance together,
and eagerly expected the Lord to come take us earlier.
Now we hear the news that the Lord has returned,
but if we don’t investigate or seek, we’ll lose the Lord’s salvation!
Cousin, we can’t listen!
On hearing it, we’ll be deceived.
How many times has the pastor told us?
The “Eastern Lightning” is a heresy. It’s a mafia.
Whoever joins it won’t be able to come out!
Yeah, we can’t listen.
Sisters, the apostle Paul said,
Fear is from Satan. With God, there is no fear.
With God, all is strong, joyful, released, and free.
As believers in God,
we should believe in God’s almightiness and sovereignty
and rely on God to discern the way of the truth
rather than be afraid or on guard!
We aren’t afraid. You’re from the mafia.
We don’t need to fellowship with you.
Xiu’en, Sister Zhang, Sister Wang,
the “Eastern Lightning” we heard of is the true way.
Don’t make a rash decision.
If we blindly follow the religious people to condemn and resist it,
we’ll offend God.
We should have sense.
After making a careful investigation, we’ll know whether it’s the true way.
Let’s study the Bible and refer to God’s word.
Then we can discern and make a decision in the end.
What do you think?
Lord! Today I encounter such a thing; what should I do?
Please guide me.
Have a seat. Let’s sit down and talk.
Yeah, sisters, let’s have a seat.
Have some tea.
You said that God has come again to do the work of saving man.
That’s impossible!
Romans 10:9 says,
The 13th verse says,
These two verses tell us clearly
that people have been saved through Jesus’ salvation.
As long as people confess with their mouth and believe in their heart,
they will get saved.
Once saved, always saved.
God won’t and needn’t repeat the work of saving man.
But you said that God comes again to do the work of saving man.
That’s impossible.
Sister, speaking of “getting saved,”
we indeed got saved because of the Lord Jesus’ redemptive work.
But what does getting saved mean here?
About this question, we have to talk from the Age of the Law.
As we all know, in the Age of the Law,
God issued the law through Moses for people to obey.
Whoever offended it had to atone for his sin by offering sacrifice.
Otherwise, he would face the danger of being executed by the law.
So, people at that time all kept the law properly, and no one dared disobey.
But at the end of the Age of the Law,
people became more and more corrupt, committed more and more sins,
and didn’t have enough sin offerings to atone for their sins,
so they all faced the danger of being executed by the law.
In this regard, God was incarnated and came to the world.
He was personally crucified and became man’s sin offering.
From then on, if one believed in and relied on Jesus,
he would be forgiven of his sins
and wouldn’t be condemned by the law any more.
This means that we got saved because of the Lord’s redemption.
So getting saved means that after one believed in Jesus,
if he confessed and repented,
he was forgiven of his sins and wouldn’t be executed by the law.
What’s more, he could enjoy the peace, joy, and rich grace
the Lord Jesus bestows to him.
This is the true meaning of “getting saved” in the Age of the Grace.
Just as the Bible says,
Here, “getting saved” only means that
we are forgiven of our sins and are not condemned after we believe in Jesus.
But we still have corrupt disposition and often commit sins and resist God.
Then, does it mean that
we who often commit sins and resist God always got saved?
Although we haven’t broken away from sins,
the Lord has forgiven us and we’re no longer of sin.
As long as we obey the Lord’s teachings to confess and repent
and rely on the Lord Jesus’ redemption, we got saved.
Yeah!
Sisters, although we’re not of sin due to the Lord Jesus’ redemptive work,
it doesn’t mean that we’ve broken away from sins and always got saved.
Because we haven’t broken away from sins,
we still live in the fallen life
of committing sins in the day and confessing them at night,
and still can’t break free from the bondage and restriction of sins.
This is the state of us believers in the Lord.
As Paul said,
Although the apostle Paul was forgiven of his sins
due to the Lord Jesus’ salvation,
the biggest misery in his heart
was that he still often committed sins and resisted God in spite of himself
because of being unable to break free from the bondage and restriction of sins.
So he said helplessly,
Sisters, isn’t Paul’s misery
the misery of the brothers and sisters believing in the Lord today?
Isn’t the salvation that Paul eagerly wished to receive
what we believers in the Lord eagerly wish to receive today?
Sister, especially believers in the end time have a deep experience of it.
Man’s heart is taken by various poisons and philosophies of Satan
and man is filled with arrogance, selfishness,
craftiness, greed, evil, and so on.
So, we can still go with the world trend and associate with Satan,
seeking after position, fame and gain, and money
and enjoying the pleasure of sin.
Even if one is familiar with the Bible,
he can in no way break free from the bondage of sin.
So, in the Age of the Grace,
all believers in the Lord who have been redeemed by the Lord Jesus
haven’t truly broken away from Satan’s influence of darkness
and their heart hasn’t been completely gained by God.
Even if they have some changes in their outward behaviors
and sometimes they can do some good things,
their inner sinful nature still rules and controls them within,
so that what they live out is still the corrupt satanic disposition
and they haven’t broken away from the bondage of sin.
Don’t you think so?
So, the “getting saved” you talked about
doesn’t mean that one has truly broken away from sin and been holy.
Sister…
What they said is a fact.
No! The Lord Jesus already saved us. This is a fact.
Humph! No! I have to find an opportunity to use their words against them.
Regarding this question, let’s read Almighty God’s words.
Wait!
Sister, do you have any question? Go ahead!
What you read just now tells us that we’re never of sin.
Then why do you say that God comes to do the work of salvation?
Right!
Sisters, I haven’t finished reading God’s words.
After we finish the two passages, we can have a fellowship, OK?
Okay! Go ahead.
I’ll see what else you’ll say.
Later I’ll embarrass you. See what you’ll say!
Sister Gao, please read it.
Sisters, God speaks very clearly
that it is because of God’s salvation
that man is forgiven of sins after being redeemed by the Lord Jesus.
God says that man is no longer of sin,
but it doesn’t mean that man won’t commit sins.
It just means that God doesn’t remember man’s sins
and doesn’t treat man as a sinner.
But the Lord Jesus’ work just achieved the result of redeeming man’s sins,
and it didn’t solve the problem about the root of man’s sinning.
So, man’s sinful nature still roots in his heart.
In this regard,
even if the Lord Jesus’ sin offering is forever effective for man,
it can’t save man from sin thoroughly.
So, those who have received the Lord Jesus’ redemption
still commit sins and resist God.
They need God’s further work of salvation,
and only thus can they thoroughly break away from sin
and receive God’s full salvation.
It sounds right.
You’re wrong! The Lord Jesus’ salvation has forgiven our sins.
We’re already sinless and simply don’t need the new work you said.
You’re denying the Lord Jesus’ salvation!
Yeah, if God still works when He returns,
doesn’t it deny the redemptive work Jesus did?
Sisters, we’re not denying the Lord Jesus’ salvation.
The Lord Jesus redeemed people from sins.
It’s an absolutely true fact and nobody can deny it.
But those who have received the Lord Jesus’ forgiving grace
still have corruption within,
and they’re still living a fallen life
of committing sins in the day and confessing them at night.
Isn’t it a fact?
So, we should understand the Lord Jesus’ salvation correctly.
The work the Lord Jesus did just redeems people from sins but
it doesn’t solve the problem about their sinning.
So, those who got saved by the Lord Jesus
still need God’s further purification and salvation.
Only thus can they be saved.
Sisters, at this point, I want to ask you a question.
In your opinion is God holy?
You even need to ask? Of course holy!
God is holy. Then what’s the criteria for man to be saved and gained?
Of course holiness as well!
Are we holy now?
Sister Lu, do you remember what the Bible says?
And in John 8:34-35,
From these verses we can see that breaking away from sin and being holy
is the criteria of being saved that God requires man to reach, right?
Those who commit sins stay not in the house for ever.
These are the Lord’s words.
Can’t we who often commit sins be always saved?
Impossible! The Bible says clearly,
Does “being saved” here, just as they say, not mean being always saved?
No! No! O Lord!
May You keep my heart so that I can hold on to Your way!
Sister, just think: If God raptures to His kingdom
a mankind who still has corrupt satanic dispositions and can resist and betray God,
is God’s kingdom a holy kingdom?
How can God’s kingdom permit mankind who resists God to exist?
That’s impossible, and it’s against God’s holy and righteous disposition.
What’s more, if this is the case,
isn’t it meaningless for God to do the work of saving man?
So, according to God’s disposition and the plan of God’s work of saving man,
it’s wrong to say that man is saved and can enter into God’s kingdom
after he receives the grace of Jesus’ redemption.
Actually, we thought that we could be approved by God
after being forgiven of sins,
because we weren’t clear about what being saved is.
Today Almighty God tells us clearly about it.
Sister, please read it. (Okay.)
Almighty God’s words tell us clearly the real being saved means that
man breaks away from the fleshly corruption and Satan’s influence of darkness
and is purified by God.
That is, through the words expressed in the end time,
God chastises and judges man and works into man the truth he needs,
so that man can cast off the corruption,
not commit sins any more and have his life disposition transformed.
The satanic poisons, laws, and philosophies within man
can’t control him any longer.
Things of Satan have no place in man’s heart and are replaced by the truth.
All the words God expresses become man’s life
and man can live by God’s words and be compatible with God.
Man no longer disobeys or resists God but can truly obey and worship God,
and what man lives out can manifest and glorify God.
This is truly being saved.
Man casts off his corrupt disposition and no longer commits sins;
this is being saved?
O Lord! I can’t accept their way. I can’t be deceived by them.
O Lord! You already set the feast for me before the enemies.
Please keep my heart, and give me strength and faith
so that I can fight the good fight for You.
According to your words, nobody has become holy now;
then nobody can be saved? (Yeah!)
That’s impossible! Absolutely impossible!!
Sisters, the concepts of getting saved and being saved are totally different.
There’s an essential difference between the two.
Getting saved means that because of the Lord Jesus’ redemption,
men’s sins are forgiven.
But their sinful nature still hasn’t been removed
and they still continuously commit sins, resist God, and betray God.
So, those who got saved through the grace haven’t been completely gained by God.
Being saved is based on man’s being forgiven of his sins.
It means that through experiencing God’s work
of judging, chastising, transforming, and purifying man,
man can gain the truth he needs within.
The essential difference between getting saved and being saved
lies on whether one has the truth
and whether he has transformation in his life disposition.
Those who only believe in Jesus can’t enter into the kingdom of heaven.
Only those who carry out God’s will,
that is, those who accept the end-time salvation and are purified
can enter into it.
You said that in the end time God—
You said that man is still sinful and hasn’t become holy; I admit it.
But you said that there is still a work of salvation in the end time;
we definitely won’t admit it.
Because when the Lord Jesus was crucified,
He said in the end, “It is finished.”
That is, Jesus has saved mankind forever;
God’s work of salvation has been totally accomplished,
and there is no more work of salvation.
But you said that God will still do the work of saving man in the end time.
This is impossible. It’s fallacy!
Yeah, the Lord Jesus said that.
Since the work has been finished, isn’t it redundant to do another work?
God does nothing meaningless!
Hmm. We don’t need any other salvation.
Don’t talk about it anymore.
Sister, if we think the Lord Jesus’ word “It is finished”
means that God’s work totally ends,
doesn’t the Lord Jesus’ promise that He’ll come again fall through?
Actually the Lord Jesus’ word on the cross “It is finished”
means that His redemptive work is finished.
It doesn’t mean that God’s work of salvation is totally accomplished.
Revelation prophesies,
Here it says, “It is done.”
Only this means that God’s management plan is totally finished.
If “It is finished” the Lord Jesus said on the cross
means that God’s work of salvation totally ends,
how do we explain this prophecy?
So, we should have a correct understanding of God’s word.
Actually, the Lord Jesus prophesied many times
that God would do another stage of saving work in the end time.
Here we can see
that the Lord Jesus will speak in the end time and guide man into all the truth,
that is, the way of truth to judge man,
so that man can break away from sin and become holy.
You’re wrong. All the truth here refers to the word of the Lord Jesus,
and it doesn’t mean that God will do a new work in the future.
Sister, if it refers to the word of the Lord Jesus,
it means that all those who have been redeemed by the Lord Jesus
can understand the truth and break away from sin.
But now, how come we often commit sin
and are bound by sin and unable to break free from it?
Actually, the words the Lord Jesus expressed in the Age of the Grace
are not the words to lead man out of sin,
but the words to have man trust in His name and confess and repent to Him.
Those words can only bring man a true faith in the Lord Jesus,
but can’t sanctify man fully.
Now I’m more perplexed.
Isn’t the word of the Lord Jesus the truth?
Why can’t it purify man?
Sister, the word of the Lord Jesus is the truth, which is absolutely right.

Moreover,

After one believes in the Lord,
his behavior is somewhat changed under the Lord’s teaching,

Even if he tries hard to control himself, it is in vain. Why?
Because God didn’t do the work of expressing the word to judge man
in the Age of the Grace.
But when in the end time the Spirit of truth comes to do this work,
He will express all the truths
to judge and purify man and guide man into all the truths,
so that man can become holy.
These truths fulfill the prophecy in Revelation,
That is to say, the Lord Jesus prophesied
that in the end time He would do a stage of work
of judging man with the word, saving man from sin, and making man holy.
It is also the final stage of purifying work,
and is the most crucial and fundamental work in God’s management plan.
Moreover, all the prophecies in Revelation
are the inside truth of the work God will do
and the facts that God will accomplish in the end time.
So, only if we accept and experience God’s work
of judging and purifying man with the word in the end time
can we become holy and be saved by God.
